metadata.title: CVE-2023-1787 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from15.9 before 15.9.4, all versions starting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. Asearch timeout could be triggered if a specific HTML payload was used inthe issue description.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
